titles: The history of the city and state of Geneva, from its first foundation to this present time faithfully collected from several manuscripts of Jacobus Gothofredus, Monsieur Chorier, and others / by Isaac Spon ...
Histoire de la ville et de l'état de Genève. English
author: Spon, Jacob, 1647-1685.
Godefroy, Jacques, 1587-1652.
Chorier, Nicolas, 1612-1692.
notes: Translation of the author's Histoire de la ville et de l'état de   Genève, which was first published Lyons, 1680.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
